mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, self_introduction,password, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name},#{self_introduction},#{password},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO learning_data (name,study_time,category_id,user_id,created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name},#{study_time},#{category_id},#{user_id},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT name FROM learning_data WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT id,name FROM categories WHERE id = #{category_id}
select month,category_id,sum(study_time) as study_time from learning_data where month in (7,8,9) group by category_id ,month order by category_id;
